mapper.select: SELECT tr.review_seq, th.shop_name, cu.cust_name, tr.review_score, tr.review_content, tr.review_photo, tr.review_date, tr.review_reply FROM t_review tr LEFT JOIN t_hairshop th ON tr.shop_seq = th.shop_seq LEFT JOIN t_reservation re ON tr.reserv_seq = re.reserv_seq LEFT JOIN t_customer cu ON tr.reserv_seq = cu.cust_seq
select review_seq, shop_seq, reserv_seq, review_score, review_content, review_photo, review_date, review_reply from T_REVIEW where review_seq=#{review_seq}
mapper.update: update T_REVIEW set review_reply=#{review_reply} where review_seq=#{review_seq}
